explanation: [0-0] A man in colorful clothing sits behind a white table with a yellow towel and some red paint on it. A mobile phone with a green case is filming the man. The background is a pink and white wall.

[0-7] The man squeezes a prop in his hand, causing red paint to run down his arm. He has a surprised expression on his face. The phone screen shows a countdown timer. He then picks up the prop and shows it to the camera before grabbing the towel on his left to wipe his other arm. As the countdown ends, he throws the towel under the table.
